thoughts: Wishes they could atone for their mistakes
Curses c_n for driving them out
Heard a rumor of hostile rogues in the area
Catches a huge rat and wishes they could share it with their Clanmates
Still doesn't understand why they were exiled
Yowls into the night, hoping for a response
Wonders if they should join another Clan
Explores the land outside c_n's territory
